documents.s: Create a “Simple Widget” using the Paydock Client-SDK

documents.t: Take the OTT (One Time Token) from the payment_source_token field and create a session vault token Session vault token request POST /v1/vault/payment_sources HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-secret-key: {{secret-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "token": "6311c15f-8024-42f9-8ed5-200621ecfb1d", "vault_type": "session" } Session vault response { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "payment_source", "data": { "type": "card", "_source_ip_address": "x.x.x.x", "vault_type": "session", "expire_month": 12, "expire_year": 2023, "card_name": "John Smith", "card_scheme": "visa", "card_number_last4": "4242", "card_number_bin": "42424242", "ref_token": "9653863864182813", "status": "active", "created_at": "2023-11-01T00:13:22.084Z", "company_id": "65235992df412413b29a8f3b", "vault_token": "996280fe-961c-4f84-9e99-e490402c48b1", "updated_at": "2023-11-01T00:13:59.412Z" } } }

documents.t: Using the session vault token or permanent vault token. Perform a 3ds pre auth request. POST /v1/charges/3ds HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "amount": "103", "currency": "AUD", "customer": { "payment_source": { "vault_token": vault_token, "gateway_id": "gateway-id" } }, "_3ds": { "browser_details": { "name": "CHROME", "java_enabled": "true", "language": "en-US", "screen_height": "640", "screen_width": "480", "time_zone": "273", "color_depth": "24" } } } Sample response. { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "charge", "data": { "_3ds": { "id": "4c925017-5676-4a7e-afa7-710a7374591e", "token": "" }, "status": "pre_authentication_pending" } } } Using the resource.data._3ds. documents.t:
Using the query_token create a HtmlPaymentSourceWidget
When the customer selects a saved card, the payment_source_token is populated. Use it to match against the data saved earlier from the customer query.
